title: Your search - Good afternoon, my Pixel 1 phone was just about at its storage capacity when it froze on a web page. I held the power button down to reset it and it powered down but will not restart. Ive had it on the charger overnight and have tried multiple chargers to insure thats not the issue. Ive tried the power button/volume down trick and that doesnt work either. Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.
content: Good afternoon, my Pixel 1 phone was just about at its storage capacity when it froze on a web page. I held the power button down to reset it and it powered down but will not restart. Ive had it on the charger overnight and have tried multiple chargers to insure thats not the issue. Ive tried the power button/volume down trick and that doesnt work either. Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.
